entry.title: Wednesday: Showers. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Showers beginning near noon. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating early this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 4 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers this evening. Fog patches overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 26 April 2023
